title: फ़ैक्ट चेक : सद्दाम हुसैन ने 1990 में US की कोरोना वायरस की धमकी के बारे में बात की थी?
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Listen to Saddam Hussein was in a 1990 meeting with his cabinet, telling them how America was threatening Iraq with Corona Virus. This prove beyond the shadow of a doubt that Corvid-19 is a US biological weapon. pic.twitter.com/ZojPlcc5bw
